allwpilib repo: \u003ccode\u003emkdir build-cmake \u0026amp;\u0026amp; cd build-cmake \u0026amp;\u0026amp; cmake -DWITH_WPILIB=OFF -DWITH_GUI=OFF -DWITH_TESTS=OFF -DWITH_SIMULATION_MODULES=OFF -DWITH_WPIMATH=OFF -DWITH_JAVA=OFF .. \u0026amp;\u0026amp; make \u0026amp;\u0026amp; make install\u003c/code\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\nIn the wpilibpi repo: \u003ccode\u003ecd deps/tools/configServer \u0026amp;\u0026amp; make\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThese almost certainly won’t work out of the box, e.g. due to missing dependencies like opencv or pkg-config not being able to
